import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import { Form,Row,Col,Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from './FormContainer' import { useNavigate, useLocation } from "react-router-dom" import { saveShippingAddress } from '../components/actions/cartActions' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' export default function ShippingPage() { const cart = useSelector(state =>state.cart) const {shippingAddress} = cart const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city, setCity] = useState(shippingAddress.city) const [country, setCountry] = useState(shippingAddress.country) const [postalcode, setPostalcode] = useState(shippingAddress.postalcode) const dispatch = useDispatch() const navigate = useNavigate() const submitHandler = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() dispatch(saveShippingAddress({address,city,country,postalcode})) navigate('/payment') } return (

Shipping

Address setAddress(e.target.value)} required > City setCity(e.target.value)} required > Country setCountry(e.target.value)} required > Postal Code setPostalcode(e.target.value)} required >
) }
